body_html: @vrv Following Slim Readme for finetuning we have Meta+Checkpoint. Input tensor it is not named "input" like in inception5h and layers name changes. Probably for DeepDream with finetuning on user data we need to propose a larger trainable_scope than "InceptionV3/Logits,InceptionV3/AuxLogits".
body_text: @vrv Following Slim Readme for finetuning we have Meta+Checkpoint. Input tensor it is not named "input" like in inception5h and layers name changes. Probably for DeepDream with finetuning on user data we need to propose a larger trainable_scope than "InceptionV3/Logits,InceptionV3/AuxLogits".
body: @vrv Following [Slim Readme](https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/slim/README.md) for finetuning we have Meta+Checkpoint. Input tensor it is not named "input" like in inception5h and layers name changes. Probably for DeepDream with finetuning on user data we need to propose a larger trainable_scope than "InceptionV3/Logits,InceptionV3/AuxLogits".
